original_text: And I that am the Lord thy God from the land of Egypt will yet make thee to dwell in tabernacles, as in the days of the solemn feast.
korean_text: 네가 애굽 땅에 있을 때부터 나는 네 하나님 여호와니라 내가 너로 다시 장막에 거주하게 하기를 명절날에 하던 것 같게 하리라

sentences.original_text: And I that am the Lord thy God
will yet make thee to dwell in tabernacles
as in the days of the solemn feast
